# Accesso alle cure per la diarrea

```{python}
import pandas as pd
from plotnine import *
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Caricamento del file Excel (assicurati che il file sia nella stessa cartella del .qmd)
df = pd.read_excel("unicef_indicator_1_filtered_firstgraph.xlsx")

# Creazione del grafico
bar_chart = (ggplot(df, aes(x='country', y='access to care for diarrhoea', fill='country')) +
             geom_bar(stat='identity', show_legend=False) +
             labs(title='Percentage of Children Under 5 With Diarrhoea Who Are Taken to a Health Facility',
                  x='Country', y='Percentage (%)') +
             theme_minimal() +
             theme(axis_text_x=element_text(rotation=45, ha='right'),
                   figure_size=(10, 5),
                   plot_title=element_text(size=14, weight='bold'),
                   axis_title=element_text(size=12)))
